keywords: ['brass quintet', 'symphonic song', 'orchestra song', 'tuba', 'trumpet', 'french horn', 'trombone', 'no string instruments', 'no percussion', 'no voices', 'instrumental', 'epic mood', 'moderate tempo']
caption: This song features a brass quintet. The bass notes are played on a tuba. The main melody is played on the trumpets. This is backed by the trombone and French horn. There are no other instruments in this song. There are no voices in this song. This song is an instrumental song with an epic feel. This song can be played when a victorious protagonist enters the city after a battle in a movie.
